data.text: @cyndicherney5 We're the social media team which is a different department from customer service. Their team is working and processing all the requests, but it simply takes time.

@johnsonave We apologize for the frustrating experience. Our aircraft was damaged by debris and is being serviced, so all the flights along its route have been cancelled. The customer service team is working through the calls and emails and contacting all the passengers to rebook, refund.
@monkeybombs Our customer service team is dealing with a large volume of calls due to several cancelled flights. They will get to you, but it takes time.
@monkeybombs If you have emailed support it is timed stamped. They will follow up with you by email.

Contest closes 11:59pm MDT, October 4/20 https://t.co/lrk2EMqqV0
@YYJRampie @yvrairport https://t.co/2mIHR89xkb
